channel.title: UKRA - United Kingdom Rocketry Association - agm

item.title: New safety code and upcoming AGM
item.description:
UKRA is delighted to announce the release of version 7.0 of the UKRA Safety Code. This version includes a significant overhaul in document layout, improved clarification of key guidance and updated distance tables to reflect modern safety considerations. The new version of this safety code is available on the dedicated Safety Code page here.

UKRA would also like to take this opportunity to advise members that the UKRA AGM will be virtual this year and currently expects for it to occur late autumn, provisionally October. Please keep an eye out for future announcements regarding this AGM.

Tags: 
safety code
agm
item.dc:creator: Stuart

item.title: UKRA Annual General Meeting 2019
item.description:
UKRA is pleased to announce that the Annual General Meeting (AGM) 2019 will be held at the International Rocket Week hosted by SARA and STAAR Research.

The AGM will be held on Saturday 24th August at 8pm at the Lapwing Lodge base camp, for directions please see the International Rocket Week website.

We hope to be able to host a remote dial-in session for UKRA members to listen to the AGM. Votes cannot be counted over the dial-in session and therefore we recommend that UKRA members unable to attend familiarise themselves with the postal voting system.

Tags: 
agm
item.dc:creator: Stuart
